00028  SUBROUTINE Stream
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE Domain,      ONLY : ni, now, nxt, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00032  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eta, eta2
00033  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f
00034  IMPLICIT NONE
00035 
00036 ! Local Variables
00037  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00038 
00039  DO j = ymin, ymax
00040    DO i = xmin, xmax
00041 
00042 ! Identify near neighbors
00043      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00044      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00045      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00046      js = ni(i,j,4)
00047 
00048 ! Relax and stream order parameter distribution function
00049      f(ie, j,1,nxt) = eta*f(i,j,1,now) + eta2*f(ie,j,1,now)
00050      f( i,jn,2,nxt) = eta*f(i,j,2,now) + eta2*f(i,jn,2,now)
00051      f(iw, j,3,nxt) = eta*f(i,j,3,now) + eta2*f(iw,j,3,now)
00052      f( i,js,4,nxt) = eta*f(i,j,4,now) + eta2*f(i,js,4,now)
00053    END DO
00054  END DO
00055 
00056  RETURN
00057  END SUBROUTINE Stream
